name: Monster Box Infestation
description:
Controls:
WASD or Arrow Keys to move.
Left Click - Regular Shot
Right Click - Burning Shot
Defeat as many enemies as you can to get a high score. Use regular shots to defeat enemies and "Burning Shot" to destroy corpses. Whenever the enemies run over corpses, they will become faster and have increased HP. As time goes on, more enemies will spawn and they will get stronger!
